title: Osun-Osogbo Sacred Grove
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, this sacred forest is a symbol of Yoruba spirituality and heritage.

title: Nike Art Gallery
description: One of Nigeria's top art galleries featuring works by local artists, traditional crafts, and workshops.

title: Ataoja Palace
description: Historic palace of the traditional ruler of Osogbo, rich in culture and architecture.

title: Osun State Government House
description: The seat of the state government, often visited for civic engagement and tourism.

title: Laro Timehin College
description: A historical institution known for academic excellence and community contributions.

title: Unity Park
description: A family-friendly park ideal for relaxation and small events.

title: Osogbo City Stadium
description: A popular venue for sports events and cultural festivals.

title: Nelson Mandela Freedom Park
description: A tribute park dedicated to Nelson Mandela, a peaceful recreation spot in the heart of the city.
